categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Molos was a planet in the galaxy that was under the rule of King Amand during the Galactic Civil War and controlled by the Galactic Empire. Following an uprising against the Empire, the Alliance to Restore the Republic dispatched aid, leading to the creation of a civilian army. In the following Battle of Mololopis, the army fought against the Empire's reinforcements and defeated them.
